General.Name: Dongguan Chitwing Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Dongguan Chitwing Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells precision structural parts and dies in China. It also offers Composite material panels, glass and sapphire products, and smart wearables. Its products are used in smartphones, smart watches, TWS headsets, VR/AR, tablet/PC, smart speakers, smart home, and other products. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Dongguan, China. Dongguan Chitwing Technology Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Jierong Technology Group Co., Ltd.

3.Name: Rongfang  Huang
3.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang. and Board Sec.
